abstract: Baseball Roundup; Chicago Cubs defeat Pittsburgh Pirates, 7-2; other MLB scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Jason Hammel gave up two runs in five-plus innings, Anthony Rizzo doubled twice, and Chicago thumped Pittsburgh to improve to 18-6, the best record in the major leagues.

headline.main: Hammel Moves to 4-0 as Cubs Top the Pirates
headline.print_headline: Hammel Moves to 4-0 as Cubs Top the Pirates

snippet: Jason Hammel gave up two runs in five-plus innings, Anthony Rizzo doubled twice, and Chicago thumped Pittsburgh to improve to 18-6, the best record in the major leagues.
